name: Locked Room
description:
Logline

Trapped in the depths of my own mind, completely severed from the outside world.

Have I withdrawn from reality, or has reality withdrawn from me......?

Notes

This is a very, VERY early demo of the introduction to this game. Maybe like, 10% complete at the moment? 

Content Warnings

Flashing lights (photosensitive seizure warning), suicidal ideation, existential dread

Credits

Everything (lol) --- DaBackpack
